What's the matter? Can't you get this thing open?

Hey, psst!

(acidly) 
The four-and-a-half horsemen.[3]

(into phone) 
Hello . . .

Mrs. Dickson on the phone.

You.

Helen and other secretary.

Nix. Lay off.

MRS. DICKSON 
(pleasantly) 
Good morning, Helen.

At Helen's desk, as Helen looks up at Mrs. Dickson.

How-do-you-do, Mrs. Dickson.

Is that busy husband of mine busy?

(indicating conference room) 
He's at a board meeting.

Board meeting. Oh, that means hours, I suppose.

I'm afraid so.

Helen, did you ever try competing with a bank?

No.

Hello, darling.

(after a pause) 
Yes.

CLUETT 
12:05. Fine.

(looking out) 
What's this?

My apartment.
